News_Article: Squid Game cryptocurrency scam leaves investors defrauded after sudden rise and fall in token value.
Multichain Exploit	Fantom Foundation pursues legal action against Multichain Foundation over $122M exploit after a bridge exploit.
Wallet Hack	Fantom Foundation hot wallet hacked for $550K total estimated losses up to $7 million.
Token	Stars Arena platform on Avalanche blockchain suffered a reentrancy exploit resulting in a loss of around $3 million.
AnubisDAO involved in a rug pull where around $60 million was lost shortly after project's launch.
DeFi100 debunked rumors claimed developers ran with $32 million; stemmed from a hacked website message.
Luna Yield on Solana blockchain involved in a rug pull approximately $6.7 million was drained.
Ronin network associated with Axie Infinity game experienced a security breach with $625 million stolen.
